title: 关于skript的target问题
txt_content:
我想让当玩家右键下界之星并指向一个玩家时，触发东西，但是这么写无效...
on rightclick holding a nether star:
        if the player is the target player:
        ***************************复制代码

replies.txt_content:
on right click on player with nether star:
        send "这是一段文字" to player
来自-plant with hoe.sk
on rightclick on grass, dirt or soil with any hoe:
还是那句话，多看看例子……
不过这次有些细节，我没看过bukkit API所以暂时没办法解释，target这个关键词是由ch.njol.skript.classes.data.DefaultConverters$11@5ee046b7自己包装的，点击的时候获取到了谁并不清楚，只是报错[22:12:52] [Server thread/INFO]: [Skript]  -x- was cancelled，反正我觉得是很迷，多看看例子吧……
